(5) Compliance with Capital Adequacy Regulations 1) Calculation of Market Risk Equivalent

The market risk equivaient refers to the sum of market risk in the trading account and foreign exchange risk and com- modities risk in accounts other than the trading account, which is a factor used to calcuiate capital adequacy ratio. We caicuiate the market risk equivaient mainly by applying the Internal Models Approach*.
